class_notes:
Required lab: ENVS 347L meets Thursdays, 1pm-3:45pm
Students who do not register for the lab, will be dropped from the course.
course_description: This course examines cultural and physical landscapes and their temporal and spatial changes of natural and built environments and by incorporating the use of geospatial technologies and methods in their examination.
prerequisites: ENVS 131 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 2485, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Page, Status: Open
